definitions.definition: a warning of danger, usually a loud noise or flashing light:
examples: If there's any trouble, raise/sound the alarm by pulling the emergency cord.

definitions.definition: a device that makes a loud noise to warn of danger:
If an electronic device such as a watch or computer has an alarm, it can be set to make a noise at a particular time.
to make someone worried or frightened:
examples: I didn't want to alarm him by telling him that she was ill.
